text-block.first-line: What can you expect from being a reseller for Intensity Glow Products?

You also have the support of Intensity Glow Products and you will be able to learn a lot of things when it comes to how to use different products and what products to use depending on what you are trying to accomplish.

content.xb: All our products are tested by dermatologists and they do what they claim to do if used as directed.

text-block.content: you will also get good deals on all our products that are not available to others. Our newest deal is our 5 + 1 deal on all our products, except the supplements.

Of course you will have to buy in volumes of at least 5 of any one item to be able to enjoy the low reseller prices that we are offering. Those prices are set so that there will be good earnings potential for you on each item.
